name: Arteria Creative Network, Institute for Creative Industries
goal:
Support the Western Blakans countries Cultural and creative industry to have sufficient capacities to contribute to job creation and economic growth in the mentioned region as well as to contribute to smoother accession of remaining candidate countries in the Balkans.
The organizational goal assumes the following:
• Raise awareness on relevance of the CCI in terms of major economical drivers in the EU (and Globally);
• Establish an effective, service oriented networking cultural and creative platform for the Western Balkans countries aiming to facilitate mobility, access to financing, audience development and enable new business models for cooperation and exchange that are sustainable and feasible
• Strengthen technical and managerial capacities of the Western Balkans CCI representatives;
• Improve legislative and fiscal environment in the sector;
• Establish of a permanent dialogue between CCI representatives and respective Governments with the aim of obtaining more responsive state support;
• Strengthen the presence of the CCI on the regional market of Western Balkan countries.
interests: Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Regional Policy
euInitiatives:
EU Agenda for Culture 2018
In 2018 the EC adopted the new Agenda for culture. The New Agenda has three strategic objectives, with social, economic and external dimensions.
In terms of external dimensions, the below stated is in particular relevant for Western Balkans:
• Support culture as an engine for sustainable social and economic development
• Promote culture and intercultural dialogue for peaceful inter-community relations
• Reinforce cooperation on cultural heritage
